title: Michael Bloomberg Angles for a Last-Minute Presidential Run | Jim Himes & Anna Kendrick
itunes:title: Michael Bloomberg Angles for a Last-Minute Presidential Run | Jim Himes & Anna Kendrick
description:
Michael Bloomberg gears up to enter the Democratic primary field, Rep. Jim Himes discusses President Trump's impeachment inquiry, and actor Anna Kendrick talks about "Noelle."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
